Olalekan sanusi salami 1928 to 1988 onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, onye nchịkwa bọọlụ na onye ama ama bụ onye na-akwado ndụ nke Shooting Stars S.C
ma nwee mmetụta na ihe ịga nke ọma nke klọb ahụ n'oge afọ 1970. A na-akpọbu  aha ya.
A mụrụ Salami na Ibadan n'ezinụlọ Salami na Oyebimpe Oyetunde, nna ya bụ nwanne nwoke nke olubadan Shittu Akintola Oyetunde nwụrụ anwụ
Obodo ezinụlọ ahụ dị n'ógbè Eleta nke Ibadan, n'ihi ya, e nyere ya aha Salami Eleta mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ malitere ịmụ ihe site na ịnara nkuzi koranic mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ ma mgbe ọ dị asaa, ọ malitere ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ Alakụba
O mechara gaa Ibadan Boys High School na lisabal grammar schoolAbeokuta
N'afọ 1950, Salami bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Ibadan Cooperative Produce Marketing Union ọrụ nke gụnyere nhazi na ịkwụ ụgwọ maka ihe ndị otu ahụ webatara
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, o mechara rụọ ọrụ na UAC N'oge tupu nnwere onwe, Salami sonyeere Mabolaje Alliance nke adegoke aelabu

N'afọ 1954, ọ meriri ntuli aka dị ka onye kansụl mpaghara Ibadan n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ nke NCNC ] ma n'afọ 1956, ọ gara n'ihu merie ntuli aka n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ nke Ọdịda Anyanwụ, na-emeri onye nọ n'ọkwa, Akintoye
Mgbe Adelabu nwụsịrị na 1958, nsogbu dị n'ime alaka Ibadan NCNC dugara na ọpụpụ Salami na NCNC
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere Action Group ma bụrụ onye otu akintola
A họpụtara ya n'ime Ibadan District Council na 1961 ma mesịa họpụta ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, Western Nigeria Development Corporation
Mgbe nnupụisi ndị agha nke Jenụwarị 15, 1966, a tụrụ Salami mkpọrọ ọnwa ise  tupu ndị agha tọhapụ ya n'oge nnupụis nke July 1966.
Salami abụwo onye na-akwado ọtụtụ klọb bọọlụ na-eme egwuregwu kemgbe 1937 mgbe e guzobere otu egwuregwu mbụ na Ibadan, Hercules club
N'afọ 1950, ọ bụ onye otu Ibadan District Football Association, otu nzukọ na-elekọta Ibadan Lions football club
N'oge ọ nọ n'òtù ahụ, ọ bụ onye njikwa otu ọdụm ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi oche nke njikọ ahụ
Nhọpụta ya na Western Nigeria Sports Council mere ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm n'òtù ahụ n'ihi esemokwu nwere ike ime
Mana mgbe ọ nọ na njikọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere otu ndị na-eto eto dịka J.O
Obi ma kwado ụgwọ ọrụ maka ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ  n'oge bọọlụ na obodo ahụ ka nọ n'ọkwa na-atọ ụtọ na ndị egwuregwu nwere ọrụ nwa oge ma mgbe ụfọdụ zụta ngwá ọrụ nke ha
N'afọ 1963, mgbe a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi nchịkwa na Western Nigeria Development Corporation
Na WNDC, o nyere aka malite klọb egwuregwu WNDC nke dị na Ibadan nke e mechara mara dị ka WNDC Shooting Stars, IICC Shooting Stars na 3SC
Tupu 1963, a maara klọb ahụ dị ka Pepsi-Cola FC mgbe ahụ Pepsi- Cola na-achịkwa ya
Ọ na-etinye aka n'ịkpọbata ọtụtụ ndị egwuregwu na klọb gụnyere, Jide Johnson, Godwin Etemeke, Muda Lawal
N'afọ ndị 1970, klọb ahụ meriri iko kọntinent
Mmekọrịta ya na klọb ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-akwado ndụ nke kpakpando na-agba égbè.
Salami nwere ụlọ ọrụ akwa na Lagos ma bụrụ onye nduzi nke Solel Boneh, Naijiria.
